title: POISON IVY MISERY & RELIEF!
content: Mesa Verde National Park - Image courtesy Micha L Riser, released to public domain.  It's that time of year again! I was out mowing my property the other day and mowed over poison ivy! Within 2 days I was covered in a rash all over my body. Especially on my throat and chin and so many other places that it spread.  I found an old bar of Poison Ivy Soap and the minute I started using it I could feel cool relief the "devils itch oil" being sucked out of my skin. AHHHH! Relief!!!! I used this every 12 hours in a medium warm shower. I turned the water off, vigorously soaped my entire body and then let it stay on my skin for at least 5 minutes. Extra rashy spots got an extra dose! Then I rinsed off with Luke warm water, pat dry and change clothes again. Within 2 DAYS my rash was gone, no blisters or scabs and no SCARS! After my skin started drying out I dabbed it with Neosporin 2 times a day. I took an antihistamine to keep the itch down and what normally would have lasted forever for me was over in about a week. Now I use it every time I shower after I mow or work outside.  *Also works great for bug bite itch for me!!  ** SAFE for EVERYONE! SAFE for PREGNANCY!  I highly recommend this Poison Ivy Soap - It was wonderful for me! You can get on your next Amazon order!! Just click on the link or the pic below to add it to your cart!  Poison Ivy Soap by the Poison Ivy Soap Company
